item.title: Gérard Depardieu to Stand Trial on Rape Charges
item.description: A French investigating judge has ordered the French actor to be tried in a criminal court over an alleged 2018 rape of actress Charlotte Arnould.

item.title: Gérard Depardieu to Stand Trial on Rape Charges
item.description: A French investigating judge has ordered the French actor to be tried in a criminal court over an alleged 2018 rape of actress Charlotte Arnould.
